title: Anne Hathaway becomes 'Momazon,' shows off her baby bump in another designer outfit
text:
CLOSE At her Hollywood Walk of Fame star ceremony, Anne Hathaway pays tribute to late director Jonathan Demme and salutes her family. (May 10) AP

Anne Hathaway knows how to stylishly dress a growing belly.

The 36-year-old, who is expecting her second child with husband Adam Shulman, showed off her chic pregnancy style yet again at the premiere of her upcoming Amazon series "Modern Love" Thursday.

At the premiere's reception, which took place at the Museum of Modern Love in New York City, Hathaway donned an all-white Oscar de la Renta ensemble that perfectly snuggled her baby bump.

She also wore Kentshire Galleries jewelry that included an antique gold and turquoise necklace along with gold earrings and a turquoise and diamond ring by David Webb, the company shared on Instagram. Chanel makeup artist Kate Lee did her makeup, and celebrity stylist Adir Abergel did her hair.

Anne Hathaway places a loving hand on her baby bump on the "Modern Love" red carpet. (Photo: ANGELA WEISS, AFP via Getty Images)

Hathaway celebrated her fierce look on Instagram, showing off the stunning look in a post captioned "Momazon."

More: Anne Hathaway's pregnant belly makes red carpet debut in custom dress: 'Anne + 1'

This is not the first time the mom has established herself the queen of the red carpet.

The actress' second baby bump made its red carpet debut in a magenta Brandon Maxwell halter-neck dress, accentuated with three cut-outs. It turns out the dress was made just for the "Serenity" actress, the designer shared on Instagram Aug. 8.

Anne Hathaway rocks a custom Brandon Maxwell dress to the opening night performance of "Sea Wall / A Life" on Broadway. (Photo: Walter McBride, WireImage,)

More: Anne Hathaway reveals baby bump, gives 'extra love' to those struggling with infertility

"Gorgeous mama to be and positively one of the nicest people on planet earth, @annehathaway wears custom #brandonmaxwell to tonight’s broadway debut of @seawallalife," Maxwell wrote. "One of the greatest joys of our job is getting to work with expectant mothers during this special period in their lives, especially because we have a few new moms at our office!"

Hathaway rocked the red carpet during her first pregnancy as well, wearing a beaded black and gold Elizabeth Taylor-inspired Naeem Khan gown to the Vanity Fair Oscar bash in 2016.

A pregnant Anne Hathaway dazzles in a Naeem Khan gown at the 2016 Vanity Fair Oscar Party. (Photo: Karwai Tang, WireImage)

Contributing: Erin Jensen
